mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_Policy ( p_title, admin_id, p_content, p_filename, p_date, p_likes, p_cnt) VALUES (#{p_title}, #{admin_id}, #{p_content}, #{p_filename}, sysdate, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select * from t_Policy order by p_date desc
mapper.update: update t_Policy set p_content = #{p_content}, p_filename = #{p_filename}, p_title = #{p_title} where admin_id = 'admin'
